titles.title: A resolution calling for the immediate release of unjustly imprisoned Myanmar journalists Wa Lone and Kyaw Soe Oo, and expressing concern over the overall deterioration in freedom of the press in Myanmar.

A resolution calling for the immediate release of unjustly imprisoned Myanmar journalists Wa Lone and Kyaw Soe Oo, and expressing concern over the overall deterioration in freedom of the press in Myanmar.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status
War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary:
Calls for the release of imprisoned journalists Wa Lone and Kyaw Soe Oo, and expresses concern about the crackdown by Burma (Myanmar) on journalists and freedom of the press.
Calls on the President and the Department of State to engage with the government of Burma regarding these issues.
